data.text: Amazing dinning experience in Mamma Maria and I highly recommend visiting this place for traditional Italian cuisine . Try salmon Tartar and their signature pasta üçù . Thank you for kind and attentive staff üòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòäüòä

data.text:
Planed to have Iftar at this hotel , when we reached there they said it‚Äôs a buffet and than was surprised that is √† la carte . No choice with poor menu with only Indian cuisine , my wife asked for Cesar salad and she received  water melon one , waiters was confused and with very low level of product knowledge and communication , very annoying also . 
My car unfortunately in the parking had and issue and coudin‚Äôt start it , went to reception and asked a lady at the guest relation desk on Iftar time  if she can ask hotel maintenance team to help me out and she simply said we don‚Äôt have anyone check outside , by myself was asking the valet parking and they guided me to a gentleman in basement 4 who tried to help me and I want to thank him at least for his effort .
 
Went up to the restaurant again and asked for bill and I paid by card. While exiting the restaurant my self and my wife , waiter was shouting ( wait .. wait .. wait .. ). Very rudely  , and it‚Äôs like we are arrested there , the gentleman didn‚Äôt change the paper roll In his POS machine and the slip was not printed properly which is obviously his mistake while I showed them the transaction deducted already from my account , than a supervisor tried to apologize after having this mess . 

Went down to parking after calling pick up car assistance and valet parking was not helpful , straight he was asking me about a Mercedes car parked there long time ago which I don‚Äôt know at all and I‚Äôm not concerned ( he was thinking that it belong to me ) which really very annoying  , he made us waiting and was shooting even saying bad words just because he want priorities other guest cars to exit the parking . 

To the higher management, your hotel is catastrophic, your services are the lowest , your team are bellow the minimum levels . 

It‚Äôs beautiful hotel in the heart of Dubai and you are going to affect the nice image of services and hospitality  that we all know in the country .
data.title: Catastrophic staff and service

data.text: I have been in a Funny Cat Sport Bar and it is really a great place to go and enjoy time with friends, especially if you want to see a footbal match. The food and drinks are really nice. Atmosphere and music was one of the best and of course a very lovely staff! Highly recommend this place üëç
data.title: Wonderful sport bar

data.text: I have met the hotel, wow, so nice hotel. Including that it has an amazing and fully equipped ZOLOTO gym, they also offer a great personal, it was amazing to be in Dubai and have this facility. I'd like to come back more, what amazing time. Great hotel.
data.title: The nice hotel with a really nice GYM

data.text: I love this hotel and how many food restaurants ,bars and clubs it has. My personal favourite is ‚ÄúMamma Mia‚Äù restaurant and ‚ÄúCavo‚Äù night club and restaurant. A high recommend to visit your friends to enjoy your night! It has an amazing location in business bay with a delightful Burj Khalifa view.
data.title: A high recommend to visit with your friends for a fun night
